attributes.review: this app is horrible. i was only trying to show support & not even 5 minutes in while using the app, my phone started glitching crazy. also found out that the app was sharing my data with other sites. ugh! this is the last time i will ever support big daddy orange 🍊
attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD

attributes.review: It made me feel like I had accidentally joined a cult and the design made me want to puke. Waaaaaaayyyyy to many notifications that we’re all useless. The app is barely functional anyway it kept glitching on me and closing suddenly with no warning. I wouldn’t recommend this to my worst enemy
attributes.title: A horrendous experience

attributes.review: This app is absolutely horrifying. It took forever to download and made my phone super glitchy. After I downloaded it weird things started to happen and I think I am being haunted by stupid white privileged people 😟. It’s absolutely terrifying and they will do anything to get their way. This app is TERRIBLE.
attributes.title: This app cursed me

attributes.review: This app is so unsafe they hacked into my phone!!! I recently got hacked into my insta account and as I went to look into what hacked me IT SAID THIS APP. Even though it asks to turn location off it keeps it on AT ALL TIMES. IF YOU DOWNLOAD THIS APP YOU ARE SETTING YOURSELF TO BE UNSAFE!! Whatever you do do not download this app, unless you want to be kidnapped. Stay safe and do NOT download this app.
attributes.title: HORRIBLE AND DANGEROUS APP

attributes.userName: oh to see without my eyess 🤬

attributes.title: no ❤️
